topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fbffac6368720da87a0600#post_54fbffac6368720da87a0600
[bq="Albus Fahrenheits"]Does anyone know where I can get a cybernetic eye?[/bq]
They're in the prototype phase and that they currently only let people distinguish objects.  It's for people that are blind to at least be able to see if there's a object in front of the, but can't distinguish colors or any letters.

To put it simply: they're in the proof of concept phase where the point isn't to give people 20/20 vision, but rather prove that it's possible so that 5-10 years from now we'll be able to have cybernetic eyes.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
